Text: Thank you :) Don't take out the time to say thanks on these comments often enough. eztv is epic.
I agree with karun0109 - truly epic. Thanks eztv.

Because of you EZTV, I'm able to watch any show I want, and as a result I end up buying the entire series to have a physical copy that I can share with my family. I've done this with about 4 TV shows in the past year. Keep doing what you are doing.
